text:
TalkJS (https://talkjs.com) | Eindhoven, the Netherlands | REMOTE (< 400km)

TalkJS is a world-class embeddable chat product that lets marketplaces and platforms improve their user-to-user communication tremendously.

We're looking for a passionate technical writer / content marketer. No deep tech skills needed, but an affinity with tech is required. This is your chance to design & carry a young startup's content marketing effort.

Content already drives a significant chunk of our growth, but there's still a lot of room for us to get better at it. Our product is technical in nature, so some of that content will need to be technical in nature too. We're looking for someone who loves producing the kind of useful content (insights, tutorials, analyses, etc) that entrepreneurs and programmers in our target audience really need. Not fluff promo pieces or useless Twitter spam.

We prefer on-site, but remote is OK as long as you're max 3 hours away from Eindhoven so we can meet often. Eindhoven has a great low-cost airport so this includes a fair share of Europe.

Apply or ask questions through the chat popup on our website.
